thread.title: Fears of a U.S. trade war rise in China's factories

title: Fears of a U.S. trade war rise in China's factories
text:
Fears of a U.S. trade war rise in China's factories 4:29pm IST - 01:53 
Anxiety over a possible trade war between the U.S. and China is rising in China's ''workshop of the world'', as factory owners in China's Pearl River delta prepare for the impact of potential tariffs. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Anxiety over a possible trade war between the U.S. and China is rising in China's "workshop of the world", as factory owners in China's Pearl River delta prepare for the impact of potential tariffs.
